column5: A comfey, cozy, calming small room awaits for you to enter. Location, Location, Location! The private entrance opens its doors to near by parks, musems, & popular destination spots! Only 5 minutes away from Downtown, Uptown, Deep Ellum, Bishop Arts, Trinity Groves and The Arts District. Perfectly located to all major highways and junctions.
column8: Private Entry, Private Bath, & Pet Friendly!
